properties.name: Mont Saint-Michel
properties.description: Iconic tidal island abbey in Normandy, one of France's most recognizable sights

properties.name: Eiffel Tower
properties.description: World's most iconic tower and symbol of France

properties.name: Verdon Gorge
properties.description: Europe's deepest gorge with stunning turquoise-green water, Grand Canyon of France

properties.name: Chamonix-Mont-Blanc
properties.description: Gateway to Western Europe's highest peak (4,808m) with spectacular Alpine views

properties.name: Aiguille du Midi
properties.description: 3,842m peak with panoramic cable car and views of Mont Blanc massif

properties.name: French Riviera
properties.description: Stunning Mediterranean coastline with colorful villages and azure waters

properties.name: Carcassonne
properties.description: Medieval fortified city that looks straight out of a fantasy novel

properties.name: Palace of Versailles
properties.description: Opulent 2,300-room royal palace with Hall of Mirrors and 800-hectare gardens (UNESCO)

properties.name: Louvre Museum
properties.description: World's largest and most visited art museum, home to Mona Lisa and 500,000 artworks

properties.name: Pont du Gard
properties.description: Tallest Roman aqueduct bridge at 49m, 2,000-year-old engineering marvel (UNESCO)
